General.Name: Erotik Abwicklungsgesellschaft AG
General.Description: Erotik-Abwicklungsgesellschaft AG, through its subsidiaries, provides adult lifestyle products in Germany. The company offers lingerie and clothing, love toys, and wellness products through retail shops and online. The company was formerly known as Beate Uhse AG. Erotik-Abwicklungsgesellschaft AG was founded in 1946 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Michael  Specht
0.Title: CEO, CFO, COO & Member of Management Board
